attributes.action: Free prescriptions for life long medical conditions.
attributes.additional_details: I am trying to get a campaign together to try to get government ministers to look at providing free prescriptions for those with life long medical conditions. Currently people with epilepsy, diabetes, any type of cancer and several other medical conditions are entitled to free prescriptions. I suffer from a life limiting heart condition and take warfarin daily but despite this being the most used anti coagulant in the uk is not available free. Please help my cause and sign this on line petition.

rejection.details: Please see: Free prescriptions for anticoagulants (Warfarin, etc)
